items.headline: The great ‘shrinkflation’ of housing in America: What $500,000 buys today vs. what it bought in 2019
items.summary_en: In 2019, $500,000 was more than enough to buy a single-family home in much of the U.S. Today, that amount only covers the cost of a condo at best in some cities.
